cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class Photo contains methods for storing filename, caption, date/time, and tags as well as the ability to edit photos
    Author:
    jeffkang93
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
